```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r knitr, echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
knitr::include_graphics("welfare-paper.pdf")
```

```{r download, echo=FALSE}
xfun::embed_file('welfare-paper.pdf')
```

```{css, echo=FALSE}
element :root {
  --pdfViewer-padding-bottom: 10;
  --page-margin: 10px auto -30px;

  --spreadHorizontalWrapped-margin-LR: -10px;
  --zoom-factor: 1;
}
```
